paragraphs.title: Description
paragraphs.text:
%md
**This notebook loads the nyc city taxi data from a location using spark framework with scala. It uses spark sql to find some meaningful insight from the dataset. This data is previously cleaned, transformed and joined with weather dataset. All these transformations were acheived using spark framework with scala.**


Schema of data:


|    ColumnName    		|  DataType    	|
| --------------------- | ------------- |
| vendor_id				| string  		|  
| pickup_datetime 		| timestamp 	|
| dropoff_datetime 		| timestamp 	|	
| passenger_count		| int			|
| trip_distance			| int			|
| pickup_longitude		| int			|
| pickup_latitude		| int			|
| rate_code				| int			|
| store_and_fwd_flag	| string 		|
| dropoff_longitude		| int			|
| dropoff_latitude		| int			|
| payment_type			| string 		|
| fare_amount			| int			|
| surcharge				| int			|
| mta_tax				| int			|
| tip_amount			| int			|
| tolls_amount			| int			|
| total_amount			| int			|
| trip_date				| date 			| 
| trip_hour				| int			|
| trip_day_of_week		| int			|
| weather_date			| date 			|
| maximumtemperature	| decimal(14,4) |
| minimumtemperature	| decimal(14,4) |
| averagetemperature	| decimal(14,4) |
| precipitation			| decimal(14,4) |
| snowfall				| decimal(14,4) |
| snowdepth				| decimal(14,4) |
| temperature_condition	| string		|
| snowfall_condition	| string		|
| snowdepth_condition	| string		|
| rain_condition		| string		|

msg.data:
This notebook loads the nyc city taxi data from a location using spark framework with scala. It uses spark sql to find some meaningful insight from the dataset. This data is previously cleaned, transformed and joined with weather dataset. All these transformations were acheived using spark framework with scala.

Schema of data:

ColumnName DataType
vendor_id string
pickup_datetime timestamp
dropoff_datetime timestamp
passenger_count int
trip_distance int
pickup_longitude int
pickup_latitude int
rate_code int
store_and_fwd_flag string
dropoff_longitude int
dropoff_latitude int
payment_type string
fare_amount int
surcharge int
mta_tax int
tip_amount int
tolls_amount int
total_amount int
trip_date date
trip_hour int
trip_day_of_week int
weather_date date
maximumtemperature decimal(14,4)
minimumtemperature decimal(14,4)
averagetemperature decimal(14,4)
precipitation decimal(14,4)
snowfall decimal(14,4)
snowdepth decimal(14,4)
temperature_condition string
snowfall_condition string
snowdepth_condition string
rain_condition string

paragraphs.title: Load data into table
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

// Transformed data location
val transformedDataLocation = """C:\Users\tranj\IdeaProjects\BigData\spark\scala\app-nyc-taxi-analyzer\src\main\resources\inputdata\nyccitytaxi\out\transformed_joined_data.csv"""

// Trip data Schema
val tripDataSchema = StructType(Array(
StructField("vendor_id", StringType, true), 
StructField("pickup_datetime", TimestampType, true), 
StructField("dropoff_datetime", TimestampType, true), 
StructField("passenger_count", IntegerType, true),
StructField("trip_distance", DoubleType, true),
StructField("pickup_longitude", DoubleType, true),
StructField("pickup_latitude", DoubleType, true),
StructField("rate_code", IntegerType, true),
StructField("store_and_fwd_flag", StringType, true), 
StructField("dropoff_longitude", DoubleType, true),
StructField("dropoff_latitude", DoubleType, true),
StructField("payment_type", StringType, true), 
StructField("fare_amount", DoubleType, true),
StructField("surcharge", DoubleType, true),
StructField("mta_tax", DoubleType, true),
StructField("tip_amount", DoubleType, true),
StructField("tolls_amount", DoubleType, true),
StructField("total_amount", DoubleType, true),
StructField("trip_date", DateType, true), 
StructField("trip_hour", IntegerType, true),
StructField("trip_day_of_week", IntegerType, true),
StructField("weather_date", DateType, true),
StructField("maximumtemperature", DecimalType(14,4), true),
StructField("minimumtemperature", DecimalType(14,4), true),
StructField("averagetemperature", DecimalType(14,4), true),
StructField("precipitation", DecimalType(14,4), true),
StructField("snowfall", DecimalType(14,4), true),
StructField("snowdepth", DecimalType(14,4), true),
StructField("temperature_condition", StringType, true),
StructField("snowfall_condition", StringType, true),
StructField("snowdepth_condition", StringType, true),
StructField("rain_condition", StringType, true)))

// Created spark dataframe and registered as temp table with name as "trips"
val transformedTripData = spark.read.options(Map("inferSchema"->"false","delimiter"->",","header"->"true")).schema(tripDataSchema).csv(transformedDataLocation)
transformedTripData.createOrReplaceTempView("trips")

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
transformedDataLocation: String = C:\Users\tranj\IdeaProjects\BigData\spark\scala\app-nyc-taxi-analyzer\src\main\resources\inputdata\nyccitytaxi\out\transformed_joined_data.csv
tripDataSchema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(vendor_id,StringType,true), StructField(pickup_datetime,TimestampType,true), StructField(dropoff_datetime,TimestampType,true), StructField(passenger_count,IntegerType,true), StructField(trip_distance,DoubleType,true), StructField(pickup_longitude,DoubleType,true), StructField(pickup_latitude,DoubleType,true), StructField(rate_code,IntegerType,true), StructField(store_and_fwd_flag,StringType,true), StructField(dropoff_longitude,DoubleType,true), StructField(dropoff_latitude,DoubleType,true), StructF...

paragraphs.title: Number of trips per day
paragraphs.text: %sql select trip_date, count(*) as totaltrips from trips group by trip_date

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text: %sql select weekofyear(trip_date) as week_of_yr ,count(*) as totaltrips from trips group by weekofyear(trip_date)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Number of trips on  a weekly level

paragraphs.text:
%sql select l.trip_hour, l.tot_trips_per_hour/r.no_of_days as avg_trips_per_hour from 
(select trip_hour ,count(*) as tot_trips_per_hour from trips group by trip_hour) l cross join (select count(distinct trip_date) as no_of_days from trips) r

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Average number of trips at every hour of the day
Average number of trips at every hour when it is a weekend
paragraphs.text:
%sql select l.trip_hour,l.tot_trips_per_hour/r.no_of_days as avg_trips_per_hour from 
(select trip_hour ,count(*) as tot_trips_per_hour from trips where trip_day_of_week in (2,3,4,5,6) group by trip_hour) l cross join (select count(distinct trip_date) as no_of_days from trips where trip_day_of_week in (2,3,4,5,6) ) r

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql select l.trip_hour,l.tot_trips_per_hour/r.no_of_days as avg_trips_per_hour from 
(select trip_hour ,count(*) as tot_trips_per_hour from trips where trip_day_of_week in (2,3,4,5,6) group by trip_hour) l cross join (select count(distinct trip_date) as no_of_days from trips where trip_day_of_week in (1,7) ) r

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]
